attributes.action: Install Mike Bassett as England Manager
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mike Bassett took England to the World Cup semi-finals, which would seem to make him in ideal candidate. Recently Retired from club football, with Wirral County FC after staving of relegation for the unknown club. A man of passion and integrity, low wage demands and the thinkings person's choice! :)

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
